name: muscle-band
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s physical moves by 10%.
short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of physical moves used by the holder by 10%.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.
